name: Spaceship Ace Pilot
description:
Spaceship Ace Pilot is a physics driven space simulation game that will push your skills to the limit. Your goal is to collect all power cells in the level in order to execute a hyper jump to the next level. The task wont be easy, there are many obstacles in your way, like space mines, electric gates, flamers, black holes and many other.

Do you have what it takes to be the best spaceship pilot in the galaxy?

Features:
Single player
Simple arcade style gameplay
Physics simulation
